title: Who I Am
body:
Basics  Currently enrolled in the Survey Methodology masters program at University of Duisburg-Essen Working Student at Fraunhofer IMS in Duisburg, Germany Based in Krefeld, Germany  Skills  Tools: R, Python, SPSS, STATA, LaTex, Microsoft Office, LimeSurvey
 Technical: Survey Research, Quantitative Methods, Data Analysis
 Personal: Curiosity, Willingness to learn, Verbal & Written Communication, Public Speaking
